DOC.detailed_description: The YOLO TOUCH device class II device intend use circumference reduction waist non-invasive , non-thermal , low energy laser . Typical area body use YOLO TOUCH abdominal area . The YOLO TOUCH low-level therapy device consist main console 8 multi-probes construct probe contain 12 laser emission diode source power output 35mW per diode .
